podstawy-postman-description: Sending HTTP requests, handling various methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).
kolekcje-srodowiska-description: Creating and managing collections, configuring environment variables.
testowanie-description: Writing tests in JavaScript, using Chai.js libraries for assertions.
automatyzacja-description: Using Newman to run tests in the command line, integration with CI/CD.
mockowanie-api-description: Creating mock API servers, simulating server responses.
pre-request-test-scripts-description: Writing scripts executed before and after requests, manipulating variables.
dokumentacja-api-description: Generating and sharing API documentation directly from Postman.
wspolpraca-zespol-description: Using collection sharing, comments, version control.
